game.name: Kissed By A Star
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Embark on a journey through catastrophic disasters, supernatural horrors, and ominous occurrences in this turn-based RPG meets modern fantasy novel.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Embark on a journey through catastrophic disasters, supernatural horrors, and ominous occurrences in this turn-based RPG meets modern fantasy novel.
